channel.title: Comments on: We’re All Nomadic Gamers

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Damn, wish there was more, but the lack of detail is understandable.
This guild bullshit is so familiar, it could've played out on any server (probably any guild-based game too). Whatta shame each time it happens too; herding cats is no fun.
You're right about the "we'll take care of it SOMEDAY" crap promises people make - if you ever find someone who actually does come through on what they say (consistently, over time), keep them on the Friends list - rare as hen's teeth, they are.
